sentences.english: Okay. So you say it was painted yellow.
She chucked the mouldy potatoes in the litterbin.
sentences.chinese: 她把发霉的土豆扔进垃圾箱。

sentences.english: A large black car skidded to a halt by the dustbins.
sentences.chinese: 一辆黑色大轿车在垃圾箱旁倏地一声停住了。

sentences.english: Put the waste into the dustbins, please.
sentences.chinese: 请把垃圾扔到垃圾箱里。

sentences.english: You're supposed to separate out your recyclables and put them in a separate bin.
sentences.chinese: 你应该把可以回收的废物分开，放到不同的垃圾箱。

sentences.english: No, but she's applying her lesson on curb searches by going through their trash.
sentences.chinese: 没有，不过她正在学活学用调查课程翻垃圾箱呢。

sentences.english: She couldn't hold a job. We'd been forced to scrounge for food in dumpsters.
sentences.chinese: 她无力工作，我们有一度甚至在垃圾箱里找吃的。

sentences.english: Lin Li is throwing batteries in to the dustbin, Wang Tian sees and stops him.
sentences.chinese: 林立把电池扔进垃圾箱，王恬看见并阻止他。

sentences.english: The dustbins were emptied every day.
Crack an egg into the pan and throw the shell into the garbage.
sentences.chinese: 打一个鸡蛋放入锅中并将鸡蛋壳扔进垃圾箱。

sentences.english: People used to collect waste in dustbins.
sentences.chinese: 人们过去使用垃圾箱收集垃圾。

sentences.english: Dropping the bag to the ground, I pulled out the key to the Dumpster’s padlock.
sentences.chinese: 我把垃圾袋丢在地上，然后掏出钥匙开垃圾箱的挂锁。

sentences.english: Throw any left-over food in the garbage .
sentences.chinese: 把剩下的食物倒进垃圾箱里。

sentences.english: You should put that in the recycle bin next to the trashcan.
sentences.chinese: 你应该放进紧挨废物桶的那个可回收垃圾箱里。

sentences.english: Put nokia 5800 in to dustbin and get a new one i think.
sentences.chinese: 把诺基亚5800到垃圾箱并获得一个新的，我觉得。

sentences.english: Please put all your sweet wrappers in the bin.
sentences.chinese: 糖纸都放进垃圾箱里去。

definition: rubbish bin/trash can/garbage can/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4 tong3]
trash/refuse/garbage/(coll.) of poor quality/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4]
to discard in the wrong place (cigarette butts etc)/to leave one's things lying around
